statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM weather_data;
SELECT AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT date, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND precipitation > 0.3 ORDER BY humidity ASC, date DESC
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT id, date, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation IS NULL OR humidity IS NULL ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 60 ORDER BY id LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80;
SELECT precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT crop_name, growth_stage FROM crop_data WHERE growth_stage = 'Vegetative';
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS Avg_Temperature FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5 AND humidity > 70;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data GROUP BY MONTH(date);
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE temperature_range LIKE '20° to 30°' AND growth_stage = 'flowering';
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE longitude < -50;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MAX(humidity) AS max_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY yield DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 0 ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE date = '2021-08-15';
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE yield > 1000 AND crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM historical_weather_data;
SELECT crop_name, growth_duration, optimal_temperature, optimal_humidity, optimal_precipitation FROM crop_information;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT analysis_id, location_id, crop_name, growth_date, current_temperature, current_humidity, current_precipitation FROM crop_growth_analysis;
SELECT location_name, longitude, latitude FROM location_data;
SELECT * FROM crop_information WHERE crop_type = 'Vegetable' ORDER BY optimal_temperature DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 40 AND longitude > -80;
SELECT crop_name, growth_duration, optimal_temperature FROM crop_information WHERE growth_duration > 90 ORDER BY optimal_temperature ASC;

SELECT analysis_id, location_name, crop_name, growth_date FROM crop_growth_analysis JOIN location_data ON crop_growth_analysis.location_id = location_data.location_id ORDER BY growth_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM historical_weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 AND precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT crop_name, plant_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data WHERE plant_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT analysis_date, analysis_result FROM analysis_data ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data;
SELECT id, date, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 0.5;
SELECT crop_name, plant_date, harvest_date FROM crop_data ORDER BY plant_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM location_data WHERE city = 'New York' AND country = 'USA';
SELECT crop_id, location_id, growth_rate, growth_status FROM growth_data WHERE growth_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY growth_rate DESC;
